TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEventArgs

summary.span: Fournit des données pour un événement de modification de focus.

span.span: Provides data for a focus-changed event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 idObject, int32 idChild) cil managed
Public Sub New (idObject As Integer, idChild As Integer)

param.name: idObject
param.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] de l'objet qui a reçu le focus.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

param.name: idChild
param.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] enfant de l'objet qui a reçu le focus.

span.span: The child [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.

summary.span: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Le `idObject` et `idChild` contiennent des paramètres de la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identificateurs clients UI Automation peuvent utiliser pour lier l’objet un à un `IAccessible` objet dans une application de technologies d’accessibilité plus ancienne.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChildId As Integer
public: property int ChildId { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtient l'identificateur [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] enfant de l'objet qui reçoit le focus.

span.span: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sont des valeurs 32 bits qui identifient les catégories d’objets accessibles dans une application.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. Le `idObject` et `idChild` contiennent des paramètres de l’objet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que les clients peuvent utiliser pour lier un à un `IAccessible` objet dans une application de technologies d’accessibilité plus ancienne.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ObjectId As Integer
public: property int ObjectId { int get(); };

summary.span: Obtient le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] de l'objet [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] qui a généré l'événement.

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] de l'élément [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] qui reçoit le focus.

span.span: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.

value.span: Pour les valeurs possibles, consultez [des identificateurs d’objet](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) dans la documentation de Microsoft Active Accessibility.

span.span: For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Objet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] sont des valeurs 32 bits qui identifient les catégories d’objets accessibles dans une application.Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application. Le `idObject` et `idChild` contiennent des paramètres de l’objet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] que les clients peuvent utiliser pour lier un à un `IAccessible` objet dans une application de technologies d’accessibilité plus ancienne.The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
